fields.name: Register With Jimbot
fields.value:
Jimbot has a new profiles feature. You can store FFBEEquip builds, status, and friend code. (More feautures coming soon?).
​
__New Commands Include:__
- **?friendcode** *[friend_code]*
- **?nickname** *[nickname]*
- **?setstatus** "*[status | parameter]"*
- **?addbuild** *[build_name | parameter] [build_url | parameter]*
- **?removebuild** *[build_name]*
- **?setlead** *[build_name -or- build_url]*
- **?enableautobuild**
- **?disableautobuild**
- **?profile** *[user_id | optional]*
- **?friend** *[user_id | optional]*
- **?userbuild** *[user_id | optional]* "*[build_name | parameter]*"
- **?mybuild** *[build_name]*
​

fields.name: Compact Builds
fields.value:
All build related commands can now be displayed in compact mode. To do this, simpley append the letter 'c' to the end of the command used.
​

fields.name: Team Builds
fields.value:
An entire team can now be displayed when using FFBEEquip builds. This will **display builds in compact mode** and is limited to 5 units only.
​
__New Commands Include:__
- **?team** *[build_url]*
